A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 14, 2010'''.<ref>[[wordofnotch:333135179|I SHOULD be sleeping, but...]] – The Word of Notch, January 14, 2010</ref><ref>{{ytl|pSb6MXwQbo4|Necrophobic Burning Trees|BPRodifan|January 16, 2010}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Water Spawner.png|32px]] [[Water Spawner]]'''
* When placed, the block would create water blocks which would replicate infinitely to fill up specific volumes.
* Added 99 of it to the inventory.

[[File:in114inventory.jpg|thumb|200px|What happens when multiple stacks are picked up.]]

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Inventory]]'''
* It is now possible to pick up more blocks after filling up a stack, however, any new items each form separate stacks in the inventory.<ref name="Forum">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796501-finite-water-today?page=2|title=Hey, everyone, keep an eye on your inventory. Notch added support for multiple stacks of the same block type (Yay!) ....but they don't work quite right yet.|author=LightWarriorK|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 14, 2010}}</ref>
** Picking up any more items will cause them to go into your armor slots.<ref name="Forum1">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796501-finite-water-today?page=3|title=If you pick up another dirt it'll fill in your equip spaces on the top left. it looks weird, having a clot of dirt equipped to your head.|author=8bit|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 14, 2010}}</ref>
* Rana is no longer visible in the inventory screen, as nothing is in it now.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* [[Water]] now flows much faster.
